comment: I stand with Katie Simpson.  Rachel Riley does not deserve a platform to spread mis information.  She needs to educate herself and learn the truth and see the facts of the case.  Johnny was given justice and millions stand behind him.  Amber tried unsuccessfully to tarnish his name and reputation. Shame on her and Rachel Riley for their warped view of the truth.  Karma is the best revenge though.  Stand down Ms. Riley!!
commentable_entity.title: Remove Rachel Riley from countdown
commentable_entity.description:
There have been numerous troubling occasions over the last few years of Ms Riley using her social media & followers for targeted attacks against others & to this date she has not been reprimanded.

She has now started a public onslaught on Johnny Depp, someone she has never met & spread mis-information about him from twitter user Eve Barlow & Amber Heard.

She has publicly stated that he has never been a victim of domestic abuse & no man can ever be DV victim due to their gender. She has carried on with the lies & harm over a serious issue for popularity gain & her own warped agenda.

She is not fit to be gracing our TV Screens whilst she is shilling out the gender biasness that Men have to face every day. Instead of talking to people whom disagree with her she blocks & reports them for abuse, then informs MSM that she is consistently targeted by misogynists for her excuse.

#AbuseHasNoGender #MenToo can be victims of #DomesticAbuse
